events.message: I recently bought a jacket from your online store, but I need to return it because it doesn't fit properly. I would like to know how to get a refund.
The case has been categorized under Refund based on the customer's request for a return and refund.
Your request has been assigned to our Returns Specialist team who will assist you with the refund process.
Hello! Thank you for contacting our support team. Iâ€™m here to assist you with your jacket return and refund.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so I can guide you through the refund process accurately?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The jacket is too small despite checking the size chart before buying.
Thank you for the details. You can return the jacket using the prepaid shipping label we will email to you shortly, and we will process your refund within 5 business days after we receive it.
That sounds great, thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I'll wait for the label and return the package soon.
The refund request has been successfully set up, and the prepaid shipping label was sent. Please ship the item back at your earliest convenience.
We are checking in to confirm that you have shipped the jacket back and to see if you need any further assistance with your refund.
The case has been closed following confirmation that the return process went smoothly and the refund has been issued successfully.
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent to gather your feedback about the resolution process and overall experience.
